channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fox to stream Super Bowl for free on Tubi for the first time
item.description: A second stream on Tubi will feature the "Tubi Red Carpet" hosted by Olivia Culpo from the Superdome in New Orleans.

item.title: From LA wildfires to hurricanes, immigrants help rebuild after disasters. Some may face deportation
item.description: After disasters like the wildfires in Los Angeles happen, much of the rebuilding work is done by Latino immigrant workers, many in the country illegal...

item.title: Judgment in Trump fraud case stands at $502 million before inauguration
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump will likely owe the state of New York about half a billion dollars when he's sworn in as president.

item.title: Bollywood star Saif Ali Khan out of danger after being stabbed
item.description: Khan was stabbed by an intruder at his home in the Indian city of Mumbai early on Thursday.

item.title: A new way to see what was for dinner 3 million years ago
item.description: Analyzing the chemistry of some ancient teeth has revealed what human ancestors were eating around 3 million years ago.

item.title: Biden issues an 11th hour executive order aimed at strengthening U.S. cybersecurity
item.description: One of President Biden's final moves in office is aimed at shoring up critical infrastructure from cyberattacks.

item.title: Inside the monumental effort behind LA’s firefight, from strategy to meals and laundry
Film director David Lynch dies at 78, family says
item.description: The Oscar-nominated writer and filmmaker is famous for the film Mulholland Drive and the TV series Twin Peaks.

item.title: Toyota's commercial truck company will pay $1.6 billion for faking emissions tests
item.description: Hino Motors will plead guilty to submitting false emissions data to regulators for more than 100,000 heavy-duty trucks. The company will pay an array ...

item.title: As wildfires linger, focus turns to rebuilding Los Angeles’ leveled neighborhoods
A woman invented the rape kit. So why was a man given credit for it?
item.description: Rape kits were widely known as "Vitullo Kits" after a Chicago police sergeant. But a new book tells the story of Marty Goddard, a community activist w...

item.title: LA's wildfires prompted a rash of fake images. Here's why
item.description: "It's not just that you're perpetrating a fraud" by spreading bogus images, expert Hany Farid says. The fakes also sow confusion about an ongoing cata...

item.title: Ghanaian music legend who founded Afro-rock band Osibisa dies
item.description: Osibisa was one of the first African bands to gain international recognition, in the 1970s.

item.title: Many U.S. adults doubt Trump will be able to bring down costs
item.description: Many U.S. adults are skeptical about President-elect Donald Trump's ability to bring down costs.

item.title: US sanctions Sudan army chief Burhan over civilian deaths
item.description: The army under Gen Abdel Fattah al-Burhan is accused of committing lethal attacks on civilians.

item.title: Latest news on Trump Cabinet picks, replacements for Senate seats
item.description: As news emerges of Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis picking Ashley Moody to fill Marco Rubio's Senate seat, there are reports that Vivek Ramaswamy may be con...

item.title: Trump's Cabinet picks grilled on Capitol Hill
item.description: Several of President-elect Donald Trump's Cabinet picks are testifying at their Senate confirmation hearings. CBS News' Taurean Small breaks down some...

item.title: Trump will 'put measures in place' to stop TikTok ban, top adviser says
item.description: Incoming National Security Adviser Mike Waltz says the law allows a 90-day grace period for the app's Chinese owner.
